1.1.name: wordpress/morfeo-images
1.1.description:
With this plugin you can create photo galleries from the images in a folder. To display the plugin in your Posts type [morfeo_images ID], where ID is the gallery ID.

For create and configure the galleries press in your Wordpress admin: Settings->morfeo gallery.

If the plugin does not work, try downloading from http://www.webpsilon.com/wordpress-plugins/
